title: HELP ME PLS!
body: everytime i try to press launch it wont open and if i spam it for lang enough it will open but that stopped working just recentl. ive tried youtube tutorials and i just cant get it to work pls help.

replies.body: It sounds like your OS might have a security setting that's preventing your patcher from launching.  I suggest going over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your settings are configured to allow access.  Hopefully, that'll get you good to go!
